content:
**EXISTING STRUCTURES**

### Electricity Generator at Position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (x1)
- Boiler at Position (y1)
- Offshore Pump at Position (z1)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (x)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (x2) and a Furnace at Position (y2)
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (x3) and a Furnace at Position (y3)
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (x4) and a Furnace at Position (y4)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (x5) and a Furnace at Position (y5)
- Assembling Machine at Position (z2) and Inserter at Position (a1) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup connecting the Furnace at Position (y5) to the Assembling Machine at Position (z2)

**ERROR TIPS**

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors in Incorrect API Usage
- Double-check the API documentation to ensure correct function usage and parameters.

### Errors in Misaligned Conveyor Belts
- Align conveyor belts properly to ensure items are transported efficiently without blockages.
